episodesJson.title: The 10 Year Plan
episodesJson.description: Best friends (who don't seem to actually like each other very much) Myles and Brody make a pact that they'll be boyfriends if they're still single in 10 years in this JC Calciano entry from 2014. It's your typical rom-com setup, but will there be a twist this time? Does the fact that it's not funny or romantic count?
topics: What should and should not go inside the human body
The amazingness that is the movie Scoob
